contentrichtext.text: '''CWI''' is an abbreviation for the following organizations/institutions: *[[Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica]], Amsterdam, The Netherlands *[[College of Western Idaho]], a new Community College in Nampa, Idaho *[[Committee for a Workers' International]], an international socialist organisation *[[Communist Workers' International]] *[[Country Women's Institute]] *[[Christian Witness to Israel]] *[[Care for the Wild International]] *[[Civil War Institute at Gettysburg College]] *Canadian Wrestling International, a [[Canada|Canadian]] professional wrestling promotion based in [[Brantford]] '''CWI''' can also refer to: *[[Certified Welding Inspector]], a certification from the American Welding Society *[[Chicago and Western Indiana Railroad]] *[[Child Well-Being Index]] *[[Civil War: The Initiative]], a comic book crossover storyline. *[[Comparable Wage Index]] *[[Creditworthiness Index]] *[[Cloverway Inc.]], a Japanese Animation dubbing company in the United States {{disambig}}
